kpi.name: M8009C5

kpi_info.title: Failed Intra eNB Handover preparations due to other reasons
kpi_info.use: The number of failed Intra-eNB Handover preparations due to other reasons. UPDATED: An internal eNB trigger. The eNB MM receives a list with the target cells from RRM. The MM or RRM AC decides not to execute an Intra-eNB Handover. The counter is updated if the failure detected does not match any other failure counter. Updated to the source cell.

kpi.kpi_alias: Failed Intra eNB Handover preparations due to other reasons
